Detailed Description

Copy files from one directory to another one.

This component is part of installation concept. It is designed to use it as free component.

virtual bool ifileproc::CCopyFilesTreeComp::ConvertFiles ( const QString &  inputPath,
const QString &  outputPath,
const iprm::IParamsSet *  paramsPtr = NULL 
) const
virtual

Copy a file or files from inputPath to destination outputPath.

Optionally, you can use paramsPtr to control the copy process.

Implements ifileproc::IFileConvertCopy.
